Articles.Content:
Hello fellow kerbonauts,

Today I have a challenge for you.... Build.. a.. tank.

RULE 1. Stock only

RULE 2. It has to be able to move around [on wheels, no flying...unless Jeb's driving:D]

RULE 3. It also has to have some kind of armour and weapon

RULE 4. Have fun!!!

PS. This is my first challenge so if you can give me tips on how to improve

PPS. Take a screenshot and paste it to show us your creation

One tip is to show an example you've done yourself, to show it can be done. Or at least to show how far you got in the attempt!

Also this doesn't really belong in challenges, there's no real criteria on winning other than "most awesome looking", but it could make a nice fan-works thread.

Moving!
